name: msa-inventory-system
description: Full-stack MSA Inventory Management System with QR codes, admin panel, and approval workflow

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install

author: Shaheer Saud
